trends: There have been no other sightings in Shippenville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: about 25 to 50 round lights in the sky in v formation
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out on the back porch and looking to the north west, when some 25 to 50 gold or orange colored lights in one big mass in v formation flow to the west and in a approxiamte 5% downard direction. I have these lights before but not that many. This the second time this year that I e I have seen these lights. I hope that some others in the Clarion Shippenville area seen them also and will report the sighting.
